name: Trade for Animal Jam
description: Having a hard time finding trading buddies? Constantly getting an overtrade and get a bad deal? Trade Me! for Animal Jam allows you to offer and accept trades for the entire Animal Jam community. The app will show you the value of each of your items to make sure you're getting a fair deal. Also join the live chat to talk to Aparri and other Youtubers. Watch videos so you can be the best Animal Jammer. You can meet tons of new friends to add to Animal Jam. Don't miss out!  Download the FREE app today.
